attributes.action: Create "Universal Basic Income" (UBI) for all citizens in England
attributes.additional_details: The government have a responsibility to address social & economic issues, implementing a UBI program can be an effective way to address some of these issues. A key reason why government and parliament should consider UBI is that it can help reduce poverty. The program ensures everyone has access to food, housing, & healthcare. A basic income to all citizens, can help reduce those living in poverty, especially the most vulnerable, such as children, the elderly, and those with disabilities.
attributes.background: I want the government to intervene in this current climate and give all citizens in England

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634213
